Title: MVC Boost (Tools to Speed Up ASP.NET MVC Coding)
Description:
Utility tools and helpers to speed up coding when using ASP.NET MVC technologies.

Include HTML tag rendering extensions, Metro/ModernUI helpers, EF tools, etc.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Utility tools and helpers to speed up coding when using ASP.NET MVC technologies.

Include HTML tag rendering extensions, Metro/ModernUI helpers, EF tools, etc.

This project provides developers with a set of utility tools that help speed up coding when using ASP.NET MVC technologies.

Key features include:
  • Tools to manage POCO Entity model descriptions when using Fluent API
  • DbContext Service based approach infrastructure to decouple controllers from data management
  • HTML Extension methods to render pages with Windows 8 Metro/ModernUI Style (conforming to MetroUI CSS
  • Helper methods for faster HTML Rendering

You can find more information and examples in the documentation section.
